title: Double Tap Draft Beer Tower Kegerator Column
features: Beer Line Included for Each Tap
description: Chrome plated 2 Tap Draft Tower - 3" Diameter This 3" diameter, 2 tap draft tower is made of chrome plated steel for long life. Unlike cheaper "chrome plated" ABS plastic towers, this one will not peel. The tower includes: 2 - beer lines 2 - Intertap beer faucets 2 - tall plastic tap handles This tower comes ready to install on your bar top or kegerator! You will need to drill a 2.5" - 3" hole & 4 holes for the mounting hardware. Note: This tower can be retro-fit with commercial branded tap handles by unscrewing the black plastic handles & screwing on the tap handles of your choice. Some assembly required.
